name: ExampleScenario.purpose
title: ExampleScenario.purpose
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The purpose of the example, e.g. to illustrate a scenario
element.definition: What the example scenario resource is created for. This should not be used to show the business purpose of the scenario itself, but the purpose of documenting a scenario.
element.comment: This element does not describe the usage of the example scenario. Instead, it provides traceability of ''why'' the resource is either needed or ''why'' it is defined as it is.  This may be used to point to source materials or specifications that drove the structure of this example scenario.
